alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Bernard and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 300 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Poydras, or near Belle Chasse, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belle Chasse, Violet, Poydras and Meraux. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard
